message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great deal on this product. I think it would be perfect for your needs and I'm willing to part with it for $20,000.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget.

Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $12,000 is significantly below its true value. How about we meet in the middle at $17,000? This product is a worthwhile investment and I'm confident you won't regret it.
I understand that the product has value, but $17,000 is still a bit steep for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I can only go up to $14,000. I'm hoping we can find a mutually beneficial price.
